food_habits.name: Carnivore
food_habits.description: Animals that eat only meat. They are typically apex predators and have sharp teeth and claws for hunting.

food_habits.name: Herbivore
food_habits.description: Animals that eat only plants. They have flat teeth for grinding plant matter.

food_habits.name: Omnivore
food_habits.description: Animals that eat both plants and meat. They have a variety of teeth for different types of food.
